description: Detects usage of nimgrab, a tool bundled with the Nim programming framework, downloading a file. This can be normal behaviour on developer systems.
false_positives: Legitimate use of Nim on developer systems
name: Nimgrab File Download
query: (process.executable.text:*\\nimgrab.exe OR winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=2DD44C3C29D667F5C0EF5F9D7C7FFB8B* OR *SHA256\=F266609E91985F0FE3E31C5E8FAEEEC4FFA5E0322D8B6F15FE69F4C5165B9559* OR *IMPHASH\=C07FDDD21D123EA9B3A08EEF44AAAC45*) OR md5:"2DD44C3C29D667F5C0EF5F9D7C7FFB8B" OR sha256:"F266609E91985F0FE3E31C5E8FAEEEC4FFA5E0322D8B6F15FE69F4C5165B9559" OR imphash:"C07FDDD21D123EA9B3A08EEF44AAAC45")
author: frack113
